titleInfo.title: Formal Portrait of an Unidentified Man

physicalDescription.extent: 1 item (photograph), 7 x 5 inches, black and white
physicalDescription.note: Handwritten on back of photograph: ''#410, B'nai B'rith.'' Stamped on back of photograph: ''Portrait by Theodore M. Brown of The Brown - Byers Studio, 1452 Tremont St. Denver, Colo.''

mods.abstract: Formal head and shoulder portrait of an unidentified man who was associated with B'nai B'rith Lodge 171.
mods.accessCondition: Copyright restrictions may apply. User is responsible for all copyright compliance.
